item.title: Naga Vamsi gives a key update on Mokshagnya’s next - 123telugu
item.description:
Naga Vamsi Gives a Key Update on Mokshagnya’s Next

Published on Dec 27, 2024 | Source: 123telugu.com

Nandamuri Mokshagnya is set to collaborate with director Venky Atluri for his second film, with the project awaiting official confirmation.

  • Naga Vamsi confirms Balakrishna's approval for Mokshagnya's project with Venky Atluri.
  • Balakrishna exhibited confidence in Venky Atluri's filmmaking style during a special screening.
  • Mokshagnya is also working on his debut film under director Prasanth Varma, which is in progress.
“While watching a special screening of Lucky Baskhar, Balayya Garu confirmed Mokshagnya’s film with Venky Atluri. He appreciated the director’s craft...” - Naga Vamsi

Stay tuned for more updates regarding Mokshagnya's projects and developments in Telugu cinema.

item.title: Salman Khan's bodyguard Shera excited to celebrate 59th birthday of his ‘maalik’. See pic - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Salman Khan turns 59 on Friday, December 27

Date: December 27, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

Salman Khan is busy celebrating his 59th birthday today. His loyal bodyguard Shera shared a picture with the actor to wish him on this special occasion.

  • Shera shared a picture on Instagram from Salman's midnight birthday celebration.
  • Salman looked dapper in a black T-shirt and brown jacket.
  • The celebration was attended by close friends and family, including Salman's brothers Arbaaz and Sohail Khan.
  • The Sikandar teaser launch has been postponed due to the death of former Prime Minister Manmohan Singh.
“In light of the passing of our esteemed former Prime Minister Manmohan Singh Ji, we regret to announce that the release of the Sikandar teaser has been postponed.”

This birthday celebration highlights the strong bond between Salman Khan and his bodyguard Shera, as well as the respect within the film community during times of mourning.

item.title: How Zayed Khan went from 'hero with 1 hit, 13 flops' to 1500 cr net worth; is richer than Allu Arjun, Prabhas, Ranbir - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Zayed Khan's Rise: From Flops to ₹1500 Crore Net Worth

Date: Dec 27, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Zayed Khan, despite a career marked by numerous failures at the box office, has achieved remarkable financial success with a net worth reportedly around ₹1500 crore, surpassing better-known contemporaries.

  • Zayed Khan debuted in 2003 but only had one hit, Chura Liyaa Hai Tumne.
  • He faced a series of flops over the years, with only one successful film in 15 attempts.
  • Transitioning from acting, Zayed successfully invested in startups and diverse businesses.
  • His net worth exceeds those of popular actors like Ranbir Kapoor, Prabhas, and Allu Arjun.
Zayed Khan's advice: 'Live within your means.' He remarked on the pressures of social media and financial struggles many face.

This story exemplifies how individuals can pivot from setbacks in one domain to success in another, highlighting resilience and adaptability in personal finance and career choices.

item.title: Salman Khan’s Sikandar teaser delayed in respect of Manmohan Singh’s demise - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
Salman Khan's Sikandar Teaser Postponed Due to Manmohan Singh's Demise

Publication Date: December 27, 2024 Source: Bollywood Hungama

In a mark of respect to the late former Prime Minister Dr. Manmohan Singh, the makers of Salman Khan’s film Sikandar have postponed the teaser's release originally set for December 27.

  • The teaser will now be released on December 28 at 11:07 AM.
  • The decision comes after Singh's passing on December 26 at the age of 92.
  • The makers expressed condolences in their official statement.
  • Singh served as India’s Prime Minister from 2004 to 2014 and was a key figure in economic reforms.
“In light of the passing of our esteemed former Prime Minister Manmohan Singh Ji, we regret to announce that the release of the Sikandar teaser has been postponed to 28th December 11:07 AM. Our thoughts are with the nation during this time of mourning.” — Nadiadwala Grandson

The postponement reflects the filmmakers' respect for Singh's legacy and the sentiments of the nation.

item.title: Suhana Khan, Agastya Nanda to celebrate New Year at Shah Rukh's farmhouse? Rumoured couple spotted together in Alibaug - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Suhana Khan and Agastya Nanda Spotted Together in Alibaug, Rumored to Celebrate New Year's at Shah Rukh's Farmhouse

Date: Dec 27, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Suhana Khan, daughter of Shah Rukh Khan, and Agastya Nanda, grandson of Amitabh Bachchan, were recently seen in Alibaug, leading to speculation about their relationship as they plan to celebrate New Year's together.

  • Suhana and Agastya have been previously spotted together, prompting dating rumors.
  • The pair was caught on video by fans while enjoying a walk and boarding a speed boat.
  • Suhana wore a stylish outfit while Agastya sported casual attire from his brother's brand.
  • The duo is rumored to welcome the New Year at Shah Rukh Khan's luxurious farmhouse in Alibaug.
  • Both are set to make their film debuts after starring in Zoya Akhtar's upcoming project, The Archies.
“If reports are to be believed, Suhana and Agastya are all set to ring in the New Year together in SRK's farmhouse.”

The sighting of Suhana Khan and Agastya Nanda has stirred excitement among fans, hinting at a blossoming romance as they prepare for their cinematic debuts.

item.title: Salman Khan's Sikandar teaser release postponed to Saturday after Manmohan Singh's demise - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Salman Khan's Sikandar Teaser Release Postponed After Manmohan Singh's Death

Publication Date: Dec 27, 2024
Source: Hindustan Times

On the occasion of Salman Khan's 59th birthday, the teaser launch for his upcoming film Sikandar was set for today but has been postponed following the death of former Prime Minister Manmohan Singh.

  • The teaser was scheduled to be released at 11:07 AM on December 27, 2024.
  • The production house confirmed the postponement via their official social media handle.
  • Manmohan Singh passed away at age 92 due to age-related medical issues.
  • Singh was Prime Minister of India from 2004 to 2014 and was a significant figure in India's economic policy.
“In light of the passing of our esteemed former Prime Minister Manmohan Singh Ji, we regret to announce that the release of the Sikandar teaser has been postponed to 28th December 11:07 AM.” - Team Sikandar

The portrayal of Salman Khan in Sikandar sparked excitement among fans, with further details expected to be shared on the new teaser release date.

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: Not specified

The wedding photographer of Anushka Sharma and Virat Kohli has revealed that a particular photograph featuring a forehead kiss is his favorite, describing his work as '100% documentary'.

  • The photographer expresses pride in capturing genuine moments.
  • The forehead kiss photo stands out as a remarkable memory from the wedding.

“This photo is 100% documentary,” said the photographer, highlighting the candid nature of the image.

The photographer's reflections on this significant moment underscore the unique ability of wedding photography to encapsulate emotional depth and real love.

item.title: Telangana CM Revanth Reddy announces Cabinet sub-committee 'to resolve problems of Telugu cinema' amid Pushpa 2 case - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Telangana CM Revanth Reddy Announces Cabinet Sub-Committee for Telugu Cinema Issues

Date: Dec 27, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Chief Minister Revanth Reddy recently addressed members of the Telugu film industry, outlining significant measures to support its growth and prosperity amidst ongoing controversies.

  • A Cabinet Sub-Committee will be established to address the concerns of the Telugu film industry.
  • Film producer Dil Raju appointed as Chairman of the Film Development Corporation (FDC).
  • Government issued special orders for eight films and provided police grounds for filming Pushpa-2.
  • CM Reddy emphasizes promoting eco-tourism and temple tourism as part of industry support.
  • Criticism arises from BJP leader Amit Malviya regarding the government's alleged targeting of Tollywood.
CM Reddy stated, "A Cabinet Sub-Committee will be constituted to resolve the problems of the Telugu film industry."

The Telangana government's response aims to enhance support for the local film industry and address ongoing challenges, promoting Hyderabad as a competitive hub for film production.

item.title: 5 OTT releases to watch this week: Singham Again, Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3, Squid Game season 2, and more - Hindustan Times
item.description:
5 OTT Releases to Watch This Week: Singham Again, Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3, and Squid Game Season 2

Date: Dec 27, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

This week offers a mix of exciting OTT releases, including new seasons of popular series and the digital release of hit films. Here's a guide to what’s streaming this week.

  • Squid Game (Season 2) - Netflix: The long-awaited follow-up to the hit series begins streaming on December 26, featuring familiar faces and new deadly games.
  • Singham Again - Prime Video India: Ajay Devgn returns as DCP Bajirao Singham, on a mission to rescue his kidnapped wife, streaming from December 27.
  • Doctors - JioCinema: A medical drama starring Harleen Sethi and Sharad Kelkar, exploring ambition and personal conflicts, streaming on December 27.
  • Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3 - Netflix India: This horror comedy, starring Kartik Aaryan, mixes humor with thrills, streaming from December 27.
  • Your Fault - Prime Video: A sequel exploring the challenges faced by a couple against family opposition, based on the Culpables trilogy, streaming from December 27.
“An exciting week for OTT viewers with various genres ranging from horror to medical drama.”

This week features diverse genres for all tastes, giving viewers a lot to choose from as many popular titles return to the screen.

item.title: 'Baby John' box office collection Day 2: Varun Dhawan starrer crashes with Rs 4.5 crore collection; 'Push - TOI Etimes
item.description:
‘Baby John’ box office collection Day 2: Varun Dhawan starrer crashes with Rs 4.5 crore collection; ‘Pushpa 2’ emerges highest-earning film on Thursday

Publication Date: October 2023 Source: Times of India

The box office performance of 'Baby John' saw a significant drop on its second day of release, collecting only Rs 4.5 crore, while 'Pushpa 2' surpasses it as the highest-earning film.

  • 'Baby John', starring Varun Dhawan, experienced a poor box office showing.
  • It collected just Rs 4.5 crore on its second day, indicating a collapse in earnings.
  • 'Pushpa 2' has emerged as the leading film in terms of box office performance on Thursday.
“The box office performance of ‘Baby John’ has disappointed fans and critics alike.”

This stark contrast in box office numbers indicates a strong competition in the film industry, with audiences gravitating towards ‘Pushpa 2’ over new releases.

item.title: Love and Relationship Horoscope for December 27, 2024 - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Love and Relationship Horoscope for December 27, 2024

Published on: December 27, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Today’s horoscope emphasizes themes of connection, passion, and appreciation across all zodiac signs, promoting both personal reflections and relationship enhancements.

  • Aries: After a scattered start, expect uplifting moments with your partner.
  • Taurus: Enjoy uncomplicated love and show appreciation to your partner.
  • Gemini: Plan for a cozy evening to strengthen your relationship.
  • Cancer: Patience will evolve your relationship to a deeper level.
  • Leo: Ignite adventure and confidence to boost attraction.
  • Virgo: Enjoy the sweetness of love through small gestures.
  • Libra: Expect joyful engagements and vibrant moments with your partner.
  • Scorpio: Focus on creating a romantic atmosphere.
  • Sagittarius: Communicate openly to foster closer bonds.
  • Capricorn: Seek intimacy as a comfort during emotional fluctuations.
  • Aquarius: Balance family and partner’s needs for harmony.
  • Pisces: Embrace affection, finding love in everyday interactions.
“Love feels warm and fulfilling, and it’s a good time to let go.” - (Daily Horoscope)

In conclusion, this horoscope encourages individuals to cherish relationships and embrace the love that surrounds them, reinforcing the importance of communication and emotional support.

item.title: 'Pushpa 2' box office collection day 22 (Updated Live): The Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna's action dra - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Box Office Collection Day 22 (Updated Live)

Publication Date: [Insert Date Here] Source: Times of India

The action drama 'Pushpa 2', featuring Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna, experienced a downturn in box office collection, with over a 50% dip on its fourth Thursday.

  • Day 22 saw a notable decrease in ticket sales for 'Pushpa 2'.
  • The film still holds impressive records despite the decline.
  • This update tracks the performance of the movie after nearly three weeks in theaters.
“It’s disappointing to see such a drop after a strong opening. We hope for a rebound in the following days.” - Box Office Analyst

The continuing performance of 'Pushpa 2' is crucial as it navigates through the competitive holiday season, influencing its overall box office standing.

item.title: Actor Song Joong Ki Tells All About His Married Dad Life In Italy - Koreaboo
item.description:
Actor Song Joong Ki Opens Up About His Life as a Married Father in Italy

Date: 7 hours ago | Source: Koreaboo

Song Joong Ki, who has been relatively private about his family life since marrying Katy Louise Saunders, shares insights into his married life, parenting, and his experiences in Italy.

  • Song Joong Ki spends much of his time in Italy with his family.
  • He is learning Italian while his wife is learning Korean.
  • Details about managing family life, including cultural language integration.
  • Praises his wife for her warm-hearted nature and her influence on him.
  • Joong Ki's candid thoughts on marriage and family dynamics.

“I stay in Itaewon. I also have a place in Tuscany, on the outskirts of Rome, Italy. I live there with my wife.” — Song Joong Ki

The interview provides a glimpse into the actor's dedication to his family and his efforts to adapt to life as a husband and father within a multicultural environment.

In conclusion, the horoscope today emphasizes careful planning in both personal and financial matters, while encouraging nurturing relationships.
